name: 7-20-4 - 1874 Series - Torpedo Especial
additionalNotes: 1874 is the sequel to Kurt Kendall’s 7-20-4 line of cigars. 1874 denotes the inaugural year that the original 7-20-4 brand commenced production. Consisting of just 3 sizes and manufactured in Nicaragua, 1874 is well-constructed from a savory blend of Nicaraguan long-fillers that produce a medium-body with smooth notes of pepper and leather. A supple, medium-brown Nicaraguan wrapper was chosen for its visual appeal as well as it’s earthy-peppery spice.
